title: Nothing Uncovered
overview: Seo Jung Won is an investigative reporter and the host of the current affairs television program "Grabbed by the Collar." Thanks to her unique and straightforward way of exposing all kinds of torts committed by culprits—all whilst making sarcastic remarks—she gains great popularity and attracts the general public's attention. When Jung Won is accused of murder, she joins with detective Kim Tae Hyun, and sets out to find the truth. Also helping her are her husband Seol Woo Jae and Woo Jae, respectively.
